trans-unit.source: The text value of the SelectTargetZoneText property is displayed alongside the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control as a simple instruction.
trans-unit.target: O valor de texto da propriedade SelectTargetZoneText é exibido ao lado de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>controle como uma instrução simple.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: O valor dessa propriedade, quando definido, podem ser salvos automaticamente em um arquivo de recurso usando uma ferramenta de designer.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>e [globalização e localização](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the text to display alongside the zone selection control.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém o texto a ser exibido junto com o controle de seleção da zona.

trans-unit.source: A default culture-specific string is supplied by the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres de específicos de cultura padrão é fornecida pelo .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether server controls in the catalog display their associated icons in the catalog.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se os controles de servidor no catálogo exibem seus ícones associados no catálogo.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls and other server controls that are wrapped as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> controls at run time have a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controles e outros controles de servidor que são encapsulados como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>controles em tempo de execução têm um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is the URL to an image that is used as an icon to represent the control in a catalog of controls.
trans-unit.target: O valor dessa propriedade é a URL para uma imagem que é usada como um ícone para representar o controle em um catálogo de controles.

trans-unit.source: The ShowCatalogIcons property indicates whether the icons associated with <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> and other server controls are displayed in the catalog.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade ShowCatalogIcons indica se os ícones associados <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>e outros controles de servidor são exibidos no catálogo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the icons associated with server controls in the catalog should be displayed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se os ícones associados a controles de servidor no catálogo devem ser exibidos; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.LoadPostData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.LoadPostData*> method of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Implementa o <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.LoadPostData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> método chamando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.LoadPostData*>método o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase"> </xref> classe</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.LoadPostData*>

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Esse membro é uma implementação de membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele pode ser usado somente quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>instância é convertida em um <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler>interface.</xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: The method simply calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.LoadPostData%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> class, which in turn processes the state of the check boxes in a catalog that correspond to server controls in the catalog.
trans-unit.target: Simplesmente chama o método de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.LoadPostData%2A>método no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>classe, que por sua vez, processa o estado das caixas de seleção em um catálogo que correspondem aos controles de servidor no catálogo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.LoadPostData%2A>

trans-unit.source: The key identifier for the control.
trans-unit.target: O identificador de chave para o controle.

trans-unit.source: The collection of name/value pairs posted to the server.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de pares de nome/valor para o servidor.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if an event should be raised to indicate that data has changed; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se um evento deve ser gerado para indicar que os dados foram alterados; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.RaisePostDataChangedEvent*>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma descrição desse membro, consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.RaisePostDataChangedEvent*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.RaisePostDataChangedEvent*>

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Esse membro é uma implementação de membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele pode ser usado somente quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>instância é convertida em um <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler>interface.</xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: Tracks changes to a zone control's view state.
trans-unit.target: Controla as alterações para o estado de exibição do controle de uma zona.

trans-unit.source: The TrackViewState method first calls the base method in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone> class to track the view state associated with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> zone.
trans-unit.target: O método TrackViewState primeiro chama o método base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone>classe para controlar o estado de exibição associado com um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone>

trans-unit.source: Next, the method begins tracking the view state for the add and close verbs, as well as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> objects associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.PartLinkStyle%2A> and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectedPartLinkStyle%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, o método começa a rastrear o estado de exibição para adicionar e fechar verbos, bem como a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>objetos associados a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.PartLinkStyle%2A>e o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectedPartLinkStyle%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectedPartLinkStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.PartLinkStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>
